title: The Monster Stock Market - Corner The Market for $150
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: The Monster Stock Market - Corner The Market for $150
posts.post_content:
This thread is devoted to ongoing sales of T206 cards from my collection.  Pricing will be provided, but like the stock market the prices of each card will change daily, up or down.  The new prices will replace the former prices, which will cease to be valid once replaced.  Each card will be sold for the current listed price only.  Once sold, cards will be removed from the market.  You may purchase by responding to the thread or via PM.  Time stamps will be used to determine who gets the card with the earliest stamp being the winner.  All prices will include shipping and are net to me.  If you don't like the price, don't haggle, just wait for a lower price.  With the opening of this thread, all past unsold listings will be declared null and void.  Prices will change daily in all US time zones sometime during the evening or the morning hours.  Today's listings follow:

DONF35 - The most difficult of the Donlin cards SGC35 for $50

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=269540&d=1492213048[/IMG]

PA45 Try a Pattee Combo by adding another card.  Subtract $5 from the combined price or just Harry for SOLD shipped.  No extra charge for cheese.:D

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=266891&d=1490224418[/IMG]

BIGAP3 Demmitt, the Big Apple variation, is very good in a BVG tomb for $30 shipped.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=270134&d=1492698801[/IMG]

CON3  This one needs to be an ex-con for me at $30

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=269028&d=1491841421[/IMG]

FLANVG+  What's for dessert?  Flan again ;) for $40

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=269941&d=1492536658[/IMG]

If you think the Stock market is a one man operation, think again.  How am I going to make my payroll?:D
I will take the G. Davis BVG 1.5 card. Thanks Frank
PM sent on the  Matty

The Stock Market will continue to be updated daily.  Prices include shipping in the US,  but I will ask Canadian buyers to pay a shipping surcharge on the basis of actual shipping charges to Canada less single card domestic shipping of $2.67.  Most of you understand the need for this as free shipping to Fargo does not equal free shipping to Winnipeg.

New cards have been added to replace the cards that have been sold.  Check back frequently for pricing changes and new additions.  Remember as well the prices will rise or fall on a daily basis.

If this format is successful, I will consider ways to expand the market if there is enough demand.  Thanks for your interest so far.

You never know when there is going to be a jolt in the market.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=266733&d=1490065306[/IMG]

Jerry will be posted in the morning.

Jerry was SOLD at the opening bell this morning.

Inventory and pricing is changing daily on the Stock Market so far.

Wise investors do not have empty mail boxes.

Waiting for that bottom-feeding price could leave you empty-handed.

New inventory will continue to populate the Stock Market.

Call them IPOs if you like, but I don't know why.

If you can find a better centered card with the same grade for the better price, buy it and post it here and simply say "Gotcha".

The pigeons are fed, ready to take off.:eek:

Stock market futures look promising, so this may be your last chance to stoke your collection at these prices.  In fact, i guarantee it.

Hi Frank, I will take Josh Clark for $67.

Thanks, Rick

Have Ebay Bucks in hand.  Always looking for upgrades, which means the Stock Market inventory changes frequently.  

What you see today may not be available tomorrow.;)

The market is down today across the board.

Some all time lows are beginning to be seen.

What would you rather have, gold or cardboard?

posts.post_title: New Blood Coming to the Market
posts.post_content: Just an update.  Apparently the Stock Market could burn to the ground and no one would be disappointed based on recent activity or inactivity, but do not despair for soon there will be new issues available to pique your interest.

I will take the Larry Schlafly BVG 2.5 for $25.00 shipped. Thanks
James
The Jigg is up.  I'll pay $36

This would be an excellent day to buy a couple.

Let's make room for some more cards on the Stock Market.:D

I will take Moriarty

Sent from my SM-G920P using Tapatalk
Does the Monster Stock Market take Limit Orders?  I want to make sure my BUY order executes if the price ever drops to my target.

[quote name="BleedinBlue" post=1651855]Does the Monster Stock Market take Limit Orders?  I want to make sure my BUY order executes if the price ever drops to my target.[/QUOTE]

Currently $407 is the most you can spend on the Stock Market, which is the current limit order.:D

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1651858]Currently $407 is the most you can spend on the Stock Market, which is the current limit order.:D[/QUOTE]

I checked with my Financial Advisor (Mrs. BleedinBlue) and she assures me that my limit is far, far lower than $407...

[quote name="BleedinBlue" post=1651860]I checked with my Financial Advisor (Mrs. BleedinBlue) and she assures me that my limit is far, far lower than $407...[/QUOTE]

Any orders will be filled when the doors open in May.

The Stock Market is open for business once again.

If you're tired of these listings, buy them and new ones will be added.;)

Buy 'em all for $240 or make an offer on 1, 2, 3 or 4.
